skills.name: TARGET
desc: • Deals 3 hits of physical damage to enemies.
• 50% Chance to Lower Accuracy of enemies for 2 turns.

skills.name: DETONATE
desc: • Deals magic damage to a single target.
• Freeze Stuns the target and inflicts Magic Burn.

skills.name: ENERGIZE
desc: Gain 2 extra points of Power every round.
